alert.note: Alert for Jasper (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 1:04PM CDT until June 10 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Jasper County in east central Mississippi... * Until 200 PM CDT. * At 103 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lawrence to 6 miles west of Center Ridge, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Garlandville around 115 PM CDT. Stringer, Bay Springs and Rose Hill around 130 PM CDT. Vernon and Moss around 140 PM CDT. Heidelberg around 155 PM CDT. Stafford Springs around 200 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Montrose and Louin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
